API.name: API
API.description: A namespace for second order functions

Action.name: Action
Action.description: A logic based sequence of events

params.name: name
params.description: - a unique identifier for the action

params.name: template
params.description: - the template from which this event is created

params.name: cardID
params.description: - an optional field containing the id of the card the action came from

params.name: inputs
params.description: - an array of types over which the action takes place

params.name: checkLegality
params.description: - the function returns whether or not the action is legal in a given game state

params.name: result
params.description: - the function produces a new game state having preformed the action

Card.name: Card
Card.description: An instance of a card type

params.name: id
params.description: - a unique ID for this card

params.name: zone
params.description: - the name of the zone that the card currently resides in

params.name: name
params.description: - the name of the card type that this card is an instance of

params.name: attributes
params.description: - an object containing all attributes for this card

params.name: actions
params.description: - an array of all actions the card has

Event.name: Event
Event.description: A namespace for fundamental gamestate manipulations

GameDescription.name: GameDescription
GameDescription.description: Initial conditions for the game structure

params.name: zones
params.description: - an array of zones defined in the designer's json file

params.name: cardTypes
params.description: - an array of card types defined in the designer's json file

params.name: actionTemplates
params.description: - an array of action templates defined in the designer's json file

params.name: players
params.description: - an array of players defined in the designer's json file

params.name: winCondition
params.description: - a designer defined function that returns when a game state is considered a termination state and who the victor is in that state

params.name: functionFile
params.description: - the name of the file containing all designer defined functions

params.name: setupFunction
params.description: - a designer defined function that is run at the start of a game

params.name: stateScore
params.description: - a designer defined function run at the start of a game

params.name: phases
params.description: - an array of zones defined in the designer's json file

Gamestate.name: Gamestate
Gamestate.description: The state of the dynamic elements of the game

params.name: players
params.description: - an array of all players in the game

params.name: zones
params.description: - an array of all zones in the game

params.name: cards
params.description: - an array of all cards in the game

params.name: currentPhase
params.description: - the current phase of the turn

params.name: turnPlayer
params.description: - the player whose turn it is

Phase.name: Phase
Phase.description: The pieces of a player's turn

params.name: name
params.description: - the name of the phase - must be unique

params.name: init
params.description: - a function executed at the beginning of the phase

params.name: endConditions
params.description: - a function that is checked after each action is taken in a given phase, if true is returned the phase has met its end condition and the endPhase event is called

Player.name: Player
Player.description: A player who can take actions on the game

params.name: name
params.description: - the name of the player

params.name: attributes
params.description: - all designer defined attributes for the player

params.name: zones
params.description: - all zones the player can take actions on

params.name: isAI
params.description: - an indicator for the AI to tell whether or not the AI should be taking moves or allowing the player to do so

params.name: isAClone
params.description: - a boolean used to determine if a player needs a new ID

params.name: name
params.description: - the name of the zone, must be unique

params.name: attributes
params.description: - all designer defined attributes for the zone

params.name: type
params.description: - determines how the cards in the zone are displayed

params.name: visibleTo
params.description: - an array of all players the cards in the zone are visible to

classitems.description: Returns the number of cards in a given zone
classitems.name: API.CardCounting.inZone

params.name: zoneName
params.description: - the name of the zone whose cards are being counted

params.name: gamestate
params.description: - the gamestate in which this event is taking place

classitems.description: Returns the number of cards of the named type in a given zone
classitems.name: API.CardCounting.ofTypeInZone

params.name: zoneName
params.description: - the name of the zone whose cards are being counted

params.name: cardType
params.description: - the name of the card type being counted in a given zone

params.name: gamestate
params.description: - the gamestate in which this event is taking place

classitems.description: Returns the number of cards that meet requirement function's condition in a given zone
classitems.name: API.CardCounting.ofTypeInZone

params.name: zoneName
params.description: - the name of the zone whose cards are being counted

params.name: isValid
params.description: - a function that takes a card and returns either true or false, if true is returned, the card is counted

params.name: gamestate
params.description: - the gamestate in which this event is taking place

classitems.description: Returns the zone the card is currently in
classitems.name: API.CardLookup.cardInZone

params.name: cardID
params.description: - the name of the card whose attribute's value is being checked

params.description: - the gamestate in which this event is taking place

classitems.description: Rolls a die with the given number of sides and returns the outcome
classitems.name: API.DieRolling.rollDie

params.name: numSides
params.description: - the number of sides the virtual die has

classitems.description: Rolls a number of die equal to given number, each with the given number of sides, it returns an array of integer outcomes
classitems.name: API.DieRolling.rollNDie

params.name: numSides
params.description: - the number of sides the virtual die has

params.name: toRoll
params.description: - the number of die to roll

classitems.description: Rolls a number of die equal to given number, each with the given number of sides, it returns the sum of the die rolls
classitems.name: API.DieRolling.rollNDieSum

params.name: numSides
params.description: - the number of sides the virtual die has

params.name: toRoll
params.description: - the number of die to roll

classitems.description: Rolls a die with the given array's values as sides of the die, and returns the outcome
classitems.name: API.DieRolling.rollSpecialDie

params.name: values
params.description: - an array of objects (the sides of the die)

classitems.description: Rolls a number of die equal to given number, each with the given array's values as sides of the die, and returns the outcome as an array
classitems.name: API.DieRolling.rollNSpecialDie

params.name: values
params.description: - an array of objects (the sides of the die)

params.name: toRoll
params.description: - the number of die to roll

classitems.description: "Cuts" the named zone's cards and returns the revealed card
classitems.name: API.Manipulations.cut

params.name: zoneName
params.description: - the zone whose deck is to be cut

params.name: gamestate
params.description: - the game state in which this action is taking place

classitems.description: A function to determine whether a card is visible to a given player
classitems.name: Card.prototype.isVisibleTo

params.name: playerName
params.description: - the player who's ability to view the card is being questioned

params.name: gs
params.description: - the gamestate over which the query is taking place

return.description: Returns true if the given player can view the card

classitems.description: A function that creates a new card that is a clone of this card
classitems.name: Card.prototype.clone

return.description: Returns a new card that is a clone of this card

classitems.description: Moves the given card to the given zone
classitems.name: Event.Move.Individual.toZone

params.name: cardID
params.description: - the unique identification number of the card being moved

params.name: zoneName
params.description: - the name of the zone to which the card is being moved to

params.name: gamestate
params.description: - the gamestate in which this event is taking place

classitems.description: Move all cards from the given zone to the other given zone

params.name: fromZone

params.name: toZone
params.description: - the name of the zone to which the card(s) are being moved to

params.name: gamestate
params.description: - the gamestate in which this event is taking place

classitems.description: Move all cards with the given card type name from the given zone to the other given zone

params.description: - the name of the card type to be moved

params.name: gamestate
params.description: - the gamestate in which this event is taking place

classitems.description: Move all cards with the given attribute value from the given zone to the other given zone

params.description: - the value of the attribute to be checked against

params.name: gamestate
params.description: - the gamestate in which this event is taking place

classitems.description: Move all cards that meet the requirement function's condition for movement from the given zone to the other given zone

params.name: fromZone

params.name: toZone

params.name: isValid

params.name: gamestate

classitems.description: Ends the current phase continues to the next one, if the current phase is the final phase in the game's turn structure, the end turn event is called
classitems.name: Event.Modify.endPhase

params.name: gamestate
params.description: - the gamestate in which this event is taking place

classitems.description: Ends the current turn and allows the next player in the turn structure to begin their turn.
classitems.name: Event.Modify.endTurn

params.name: gamestate
params.description: - the gamestate in which this event is taking place

classitems.description: Creates a clean game state
classitems.name: GameDescription.prototype.initializeGameState

return.description: Returns the starting game state based on this game structure

classitems.description: Creates and places the cards into the zones
classitems.name: GameDescription.prototype.initializeCards

classitems.description: Creates a new card of the given card type and places it in the given zone
classitems.name: initCard

params.name: cardType
params.description: - he name of the card type to create a new card based on

params.name: zone
params.description: - the zone into which the new car should be placed in

return.description: Returns the newly created card

classitems.description: Creates a new gamestate that is a copy of this gamestate
classitems.name: GameState.prototype.clone

return.description: Returns the newly created gamestate

classitems.description: Creates a new gamestate that is a copy of this gamestate, with randomly determinized hidden information from a given observer's point of view
classitems.name: GameState.prototype.cloneAndRandomize

params.name: observer
params.description: - The name of the player to use as the observer (Randomize based on what information is hidden from observer)

return.description: Returns the newly created randomized gamestate

classitems.description: Creates a new unique id for cards
classitems.name: getNewCardID

return.description: Returns the newly created id

classitems.description: Determines the next ID number for players
classitems.name: getNewPlayerID

return.description: Returns the newly created id

classitems.description: Search for a specific by given search parameters
classitems.name: getNewPlayerID

params.name: gs
params.description: - the gamestate which is being searched

return.description: Returns the zone if found

classitems.description: Search for a specific zone by name
classitems.name: lookupZone

params.name: name
params.description: - the name of the zone being searched for

params.name: gs
params.description: - the gamestate which is being searched

return.description: Returns the zone if found

return.description: Returns the card type if found

return.description: Returns the action template type if found

classitems.description: Search for a specific phase type by name
classitems.name: lookupActionTemplate

params.name: name
params.description: - the name of the phase being searched for

params.name: gs
params.description: - the gamestate which is being searched

return.description: Returns the phase type if found

classitems.description: Get the array of all zone names
classitems.name: getZoneNameArray

params.description: - the gamestate which is being searched

return.description: Returns a list of all zone names

params.description: - the gamestate which is being searched

return.description: Returns a list of all player names

return.description: Returns a list of all card id's

classitems.name: lookupPlayer

params.description: - the name of the player being searched for

params.description: - the gamestate which is being searched

return.description: Returns the player if found

classitems.description:
A Cartesian Product function that acts on all given arrays.
Found here: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/12303989/cartesian-product-of-multiple-arrays-in-javascript
classitems.name: cartProd

params.name: input
params.description: - any number of arrays to use as input. Separate by commas.

return.description: Returns all possible combinations of elements taking a single element from each array

classitems.description: Create a clone of a given Javascript object
classitems.name: lookupPlayer

params.name: oldObject
params.description: - the object to be cloned

return.description: Returns the cloned object

classitems.description: Gets the first player with a name other than the given name
classitems.name: getAltPlayer

params.name: playerName
params.description: - the name of the player not being searched for

params.name: gs
params.description: - the gamestate which is being searched

return.description: Returns the first player with a name not equal to the given one

classitems.description: Determines whether the player controls the given zone
classitems.name: Player.prototype.controlsZone

params.name: zoneName
params.description: - the name of the zone being checked

return.description: Returns whether or not the given zone can be acted upon by the player

classitems.description: Creates a clone of the player
classitems.name: Player.prototype.clone

return.description: Returns a copy of the player

classitems.description: Determines whether the given player can view the zone
classitems.name: Zone.prototype.isVisibleTo

params.name: playerName
params.description: - the name of the player being checked

return.description: Returns whether or not the cards in the zone are visible to the given player

classitems.description: Creates a clone of the zone
classitems.name: Zone.prototype.clone

return.description: Returns a copy of the zone

classitems.description: Create key-value caches of limited size

return.description:
Returns the Object data after storing it on itself with
	property name the (space-suffixed) string and (if the cache is larger than Expr.cacheLength)
	deleting the oldest entry

params.description: Pipe-separated list of attributes

params.description: The method that will be applied

classitems.description: Checks document order of two siblings

return.description: Returns less than 0 if a precedes b, greater than 0 if a follows b
